name: SnowGlobe (itch) (Samuel Charlet)
description:
Description : 

SnowGlobe is a game made in 2 small days with a team of 7 people!

The jam's theme was "Tiny World".

Credits :

- Charlet Samuel, Game Programmer

- Dubar Romain, Game Designer

- Roussard Manon, Cover

- Nivert Loic, Comic book

- Hecquefeuille Chloe, Game Artist

- Detollenaere Tristan, Game Artist

- Liferki Selma, Game Artist

Thanks to our teachers for organizing this jam.

How to Play :

- zqsd or arrows to move 

- Mouse to move the camera (fps)
